messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3915
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/13/03 10:15:47 AM, pamhartley@mindspring.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/13/03 10:15:47 AM, pamhartley@... writes:

<< I'm the brown-haired woman built on Amazonian lines, >>

I finally met Pam Hartley last year.

She's vertically big-boned.
Very happy disposition, but seemed best to me to to keep it that way!
Best a friendly giant.

And those panels? I didn't like them very much. It doesn't seem to me to be
the best use of an hour.


Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3915
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, but only if you learn to call it a clique. ;) I m the brown-haired woman built on Amazonian lines, probably wearing my glasses as I can t fathom
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] Digest Number 3915
>Date: Wed, Aug 13, 2003, 8:55 AM
>

> I'm going to be there but I'm not a Pam. Can I be in the club? ;~)

Yes, but only if you learn to call it a clique. ;)

I'm the brown-haired woman built on Amazonian lines, probably wearing my
glasses as I can't fathom stabbing contacts into my eyeballs that early.
I'll try to remember to wear my eBay shirt for easy i.d., or if you're going
to the Unschooling Panel just wave at me and heckle me from the audience and
I'll know you're a 3Pams Clique Member.

Pam Hartley
